CategoryTotal.description: CategoryTotal groups together all rates inside a given category.

country.title: Country
country.description:
Country code override when issuing with taxes applied from different countries,
it'd be very strange to mix rates from different countries, but in theory
this would be possible.

key.title: Key
key.description: Tax key if supported by the category.

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description: If the rate is defined with extensions, they'll be used to group by also.

base.title: Base
base.description: Base amount that the percentage is applied to.

percent.title: Percent
percent.description: Percentage of the rate. Will be nil when taxes are **exempt**.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Total amount of rate, excluding surcharges

RateTotal.description: RateTotal contains a sum of all the tax rates in the document with a matching category and rate.

RateTotalSurcharge.description: RateTotalSurcharge reflects the sum surcharges inside the rate.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Grouping of all the taxes by their category

sum.title: Sum
sum.description: Total value of all non-retained or indirect taxes.

retained.title: Retained
retained.description: Sum of retained or withheld tax amounts

Total.description: Total contains a set of Category Totals which in turn contain all the accumulated taxes contained in the document.
